com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm
Class MasterSecret

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.zrl.idmx.dm.MasterSecret

public class MasterSecret
extends java.lang.Object

The user's master secret. It's a big-integer with minor functionality that serves as call-out possibility if a smart card is used to store the master secret.

Constructor. Creates a master secret with the given values.

Parameters:
theValue - Value of the master secret.
groupParamsLocation - Location of the group parameters.
theNymList - List of pseudonyms generated.
theDomNymList - List of domain pseudonyms (may be useful when providing information whether the user has already visited a domain).
